Eye of Argos:
Wonderful! Thanks to You, the Embryo will calm down and will lower their ambitions.
You said you're looking for something. Area, you say? Before you leave, You mentioned the Race of Area. While You were destroying Ferruginous Damon, I remembered something. Group Arta was looking for something on the Wall of Argos, and they are very noisy.
And before you came I saw someone took out a thing. Maybe it's exactly what You was looking for. I'm sorry, but I think You will not be able to take over.
